name: Wheel Writer 2.0
description:
Wheel Writer 2.0 app allows you to create and display light images and animations directly onto your Wheel Writer 2.0 hardware. This app works in conjunction with the Wheel Writer 2.0 toy, allowing you to create personalized pictures, messages, animations and custom speedometers. Custom displays will then appear when synched with you sync cable and Wheel Rider 2.0 Toy (purchased separately at Retail or online).

For more information, please visit http://www.fuzebikefx.com

***********************
COMPATIBLE DEVICES
***********************

iPhone 3GS, 4, 4s, 5, 5c, 5s, iPod Touch (4th Gen), iPod Touch (5th Gen) & iPads. Requires iOS 5.1.1 or later.

***********************
FEATURES:
***********************

• Create Images
• Create Animations
• Write messages
• Create a series of Animations that change depending on your speed.
• Built in Speedometer (Shows your current speed in Mph or Kph)
• Display images or series of images
• Adjust you wheelsize (20-29 inch)
• Adjust the position of the image

***********************
INFORMATION:
***********************

Product Information &Tutorials: http://www.fuzebikefx.com
Customer support: support@skyrockettoys.com
